TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象传递给事件处理程序事件控件。The object is passed to event handlers for the event of the control. 你使用对象来手动指定会返回哪些数据，并排序和分页时它返回的数据的方式。You use the object to manually specify what data is returned, and how the data is sorted and paged when it is returned. 你可以以编程方式添加或删除参数 GroupBy、 OrderBy、 OrderGroupsBy、 选择，以及在何处使用子句， ， ， ，和集合。You can programmatically add or remove parameters to the GroupBy, OrderBy, OrderGroupsBy, Select, and Where clauses by using the , , , , and collections. 属性使您可以更改用于此查询的数据对象。The property enables you to change the data object that is used for the query. 如果你将对象分配给属性，该对象将用于查询而不是中指定的对象属性控件。If you assign an object to the property, that object will be used for queries instead of the object specified in the property of the control. 属性使您可以自定义如何返回的数据的排序和分页。The property enables you to customize how returned data is sorted and paged. 数据绑定控件将排序和分页属性通过传递属性。The data-bound control passes sorting and paging properties through the property. 如果你需要手动处理排序或分页，设置属性或属性控制转移到`false`。If you have to manually handle sorting or paging, set the property or property of the control to `false`. 然后你可以执行自定义的查询进行排序或处理程序中的分页事件。You can then perform the customized query for sorting or paging in a handler for the event. 如果属性设置为`true`，您必须返回的值属性。If the property is set to `true`, you must return a value for the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性设置为通过使用语言集成查询 (LINQ) 进行搜索的结果。The following example shows how to set the property to the result of a search made by using language-integrated query (LINQ). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default2.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/default2.aspx.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何设置到网页中定义的字符串值数组的属性。The following example shows how to set the property to an array of string values that is defined in the Web page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default3.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default3.aspx.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Arguments As DataSourceSelectArguments

summary.span: 获取用于确定数据返回方式的值。

span.span: Gets values that determine how the data is returned.

value.span: 包含用于确定数据返回方式的值的对象。

span.span: An object that contains values for determining how the data is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件将属性传递给通过控制属性，以便指定进行分页和排序方式。A data-bound control passes properties to the control through the property in order to specify how paging and sorting should occur. 如果属性或属性设置为`true`、控件自动进行排序或基于从数据绑定控件的属性的分页。If the property or the property is set to `true`, the control automatically sorts or pages based on the properties from the data-bound control. 你可以自定义排序和分页从查询通过设置数据的方式和属性设置为`false`，然后创建的处理程序事件。You can customize how the data is sorted and paged from a query by setting the and properties to `false` and then creating a handler for the event. 在事件处理程序，使用属性来检索排序和分页从数据绑定控件的属性。In the event handler, use the property to retrieve the sorting and paging properties from the data-bound control. 然后查询根据需要自定义，根据从属性属性。Then customize the query as needed, based on the properties from the property. 如果属性对象设置为`true`，您必须返回的值属性。If the property of the object is set to `true`, you must return a value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GroupByParameters As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ GroupByParameters { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于创建 GroupBy 子句的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the GroupBy clause.

value.span: 包含 GroupBy 子句参数的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the GroupBy clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用属性访问参数的处理程序中的 GroupBy 子句事件。You use the property to access parameters for the GroupBy clause in a handler for the event. 可以通过添加或移除此集合中的参数来修改 GroupBy 子句。You can modify the GroupBy clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection. 默认情况下，属性对象包含添加到任何参数属性控件。By default, the property of the object contains any parameters that you added to the property of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrderByParameters As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取用于创建 OrderBy 子句的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the OrderBy clause.

value.span: 包含 OrderBy 子句参数的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the OrderBy clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用属性访问参数的处理程序中的 OrderBy 子句事件。You use the property to access parameters for the OrderBy clause in a handler for the event. 可以通过添加或移除此集合中的参数来修改 OrderBy 子句。You can modify the OrderBy clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection. 默认情况下，属性对象包含添加到任何参数的控件。By default, the property of the object contains any parameters that you added to the of the control. 当属性设置为`true`中的参数集合不需要命名为。When the property is set to `true`, parameters in the collection do not have to be named. 数据将根据中的参数的序列排序集合。The data will be ordered based on the sequence of the parameters in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrderGroupsByParameters As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ OrderGroupsByParameters { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取参数的集合，这些参数用于创建指定如何对分组数据进行排序的子句。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the clause that specifies how grouped data is sorted.

value.span: 一个对象，其中包含指定如何对分组数据进行排序的子句的参数。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the clause that specifies how grouped data is sorted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据分组通过设置属性，可以通过设置分组的数据进行排序属性设成一个用于对数据进行分组的属性。When you group data by setting the property, you can sort the grouped data by setting the property to one of the properties used for grouping the data. 你使用属性访问参数的处理程序中的组 Order By 子句事件。You use the property to access parameters for the Order Groups By clause in a handler for the event. 可以通过添加或移除此集合中的参数来修改组 Order By 子句。You can modify the Order Groups By clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection. 默认情况下，属性对象包含以声明方式为添加任何参数的控件。By default, the property of the object contains any parameters that you added declaratively to the of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Result { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在数据查询中使用的数据对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the data object that is used in the data query.
An object that represents the data for the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件将其查询表达式应用于对象中定义属性。By default, the control applies its query expressions to the object defined in the property. 中的处理程序事件，你可以手动更改哪种对象通过设置查询对对象的属性。In a handler for the event, you can manually change which object is queried by setting the property to an object. 例如，你可以使用属性来查询内存中集合在 Web 页中，或从 LINQ 查询表达式中获取的结果。For example, you can use the property to query an in-memory collection in the Web page, or to get the results from a LINQ query expression. 你可以设置的任何对象的属性。You can set the property to any object. 如果对象没有实现接口，控件中实现的对象中包装对象接口。If the object does not implement the interface, the control wraps the object in an object that does implement the interface. 当属性设置为任何值`null`、控件不查询中定义的对象属性。When the property is set to any value other than `null`, the control does not query the object defined in the property. 相反，它会查询中的对象属性。Instead, it queries the object in the property. > [!NOTE] > 当你将设置属性到对象，请不要使用`null`以表示不包含任何数据的对象。When you set the property to an object, do not use `null` to represent an object that does not contain any data. 控件将解释`null`以意味着未设置属性，然后它将创建并查询中的对象属性。The control interprets `null` to mean that the property is not set, and it will create and query the object in the property. 若要表示不包含数据的对象，设置属性或不包含任何元素的对象。To represent an object that does not contain data, set the property to an or object that does not contain any elements. ， ，和时以编程方式设置，将不会引发事件到对象，以及两个其他条件适用时属性。The , , and events are not raised when you programmatically set the property to an object, and when two additional conditions apply. 条件是原始值不需要存储在或中的对象的视图状态，属性实现接口。The conditions are that either the original values do not have to be stored in view state, or the object in the property implements the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置到 LINQ 查询的结果的属性。The following example shows how to set the property to the result of a LINQ query. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default2.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/default2.aspx.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何设置网页中定义为字符串值的数组的属性。The following example shows how to set the property to an array of string values is defined in the Web page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default3.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default3.aspx.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectParameters As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ SelectParameters { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于创建 Select 子句的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the Select clause.

value.span: 包含 Select 子句参数的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the Select clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用属性访问参数的处理程序中的 Select 子句事件。You use the property to access parameters for the Select clause in a handler for the event. 可以通过添加或移除此集合中的参数来修改 Select 子句。You can modify the Select clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection. 默认情况下，属性对象包含添加到任何参数的控件。By default, the property of the object contains any parameters that you added to the of the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将参数添加到集合。The following example shows how to add a parameter to the collection. 添加的这个参数用于计算调整后的价格基于是否对产品打折产品。The added parameter is used to calculate an adjusted price for a product based on whether products are on discounted. 该示例的第一部分演示的事件处理程序事件。The first part of the example shows the event handler for the event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default5.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default5.aspx#5)] 该示例的第二部分显示定义 Select 子句的标记。The second part of the example shows the markup that defines the Select clause. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default5.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default5.aspx#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WhereParameters As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ WhereParameters { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于创建 Where 子句的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the Where clause.

value.span: 包含 Where 子句参数的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the Where clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用属性设置为针对在哪里访问参数的处理程序中的子句事件。You use the property to access parameters for the Where clause in a handler for the event. 你可以修改 Where 子句通过添加或移除此集合中的参数。You can modify the Where clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection. 默认情况下，属性对象包含添加到任何参数的控件。By default, the property of the object contains any parameters that you added to the of the control. 添加通过参数时集合对象，或者必须包括中的参数的占位符属性或一组属性`true`。When you add parameters through the collection of the object, you must either include a placeholder for the parameter in the property or set the property to `true`. 例如，如果你添加一个名为参数`ProductName`事件处理程序中事件，你必须设置属性`true`或设置属性`ProductName=@ProductName`。For example, if you add a parameter named `ProductName` in the event handler for the event, you must either set the property to `true` or set the property to `ProductName=@ProductName`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将参数添加到集合。The following example shows how to add a parameter to the collection. 添加的参数将限制返回的产品仅值为"Bike"这些产品中`Name`属性。The added parameter will limit the returned products to only those products with a value of "Bike" in the `Name` property. 属性设置为`true`以便参数将自动包含在 Where 子句。The property is set to `true` so that the parameter is automatically included in the Where clause. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default4.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default4.aspx#4)]
